TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit CommunicationObject extends System.Object implements class System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject
Public MustInherit Class CommunicationObject Implements ICommunicationObject

summary.span: 为系统中所有面向通信的对象（包括通道、侦听器以及通道和侦听器工厂）公用的基本状态机提供通用的基实现。

span.span: Provides a common base implementation for the basic state machine common to all communication-oriented objects in the system, including channels, listeners, and the channel and listener factories.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类为 Windows Communication Foundation （WCF）中的所有通信对象实现 接口。The class implements the interface for all communication objects in Windows Communication Foundation (WCF). 此方法实现可处理参数验证，引发通知状态发生转换的事件，提供对其他处理和此状态转换进行关联的方法，并确保此状态更改得到协调。The method implementations handle parameter validation, raise events that notify the occurrence of state transitions, provide the means to associated additional processing with these state transitions, and ensure that such state changes are coordinated.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the mutually exclusive lock to protect the state transitions specified.

summary.span: 使通信对象立即从其当前状态转换到正在关闭状态。

span.span: Causes a communication object to transition immediately from its current state into the closing state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法指示在返回之前应忽略或意外终止任何未完成的工作。This method indicates that any unfinished work should be ignored or ungracefully terminated before returning. 方法可用于取消任何未处理的操作，包括对 的未处理的调用。The method can be used to cancel any outstanding operations, including outstanding calls to . 若要将 从除 以外的任何状态正常转换为 状态，请调用 或其异步版本之一 。To gracefully transition a from any state other than into the state, call or one of its asynchronous versions, .

summary.span: 开始执行异步操作，以关闭通信对象。

span.span: Begins an asynchronous operation to close a communication object.

span.span: Begins an asynchronous operation to close a communication object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使 在默认的时间间隔内从 状态之外的任意状态正常转换到 状态。This method causes the to gracefully transition from any state, other than the state, into the state within a default interval of time. 使用 方法，可在返回之前完成所有未完成的工作。The method allows any unfinished work to be completed before returning. 例如，完成所有缓冲的消息的发送）。For example, finish sending any buffered messages). 如果通信对象最初处于 状态，此方法将调用 。This method calls if the communication object was initially in the state.

span.span: The default interval of time that was allotted for the operation was exceeded before the operation was completed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使 从除 状态之外的任意状态正常转换到 状态。This method causes a to gracefully transition from any state, other than the state, into the state. 使用 方法，可在返回之前完成所有未完成的工作。The method allows any unfinished work to be completed before returning. 例如，完成所有缓冲消息的发送。For example, finish sending any buffered messages. 在调用 方法之后， 将进入并保持 状态，直到完成到 状态的转换。The enters the state and remains in it after the method is called until the transition to the state is completed. 转换包括对 、 和 的连续调用。The transition consists of making successive calls to , , and . 还有一个关闭方法的异步版本，可通过调用 来启动。There is also an asynchronous version of the close method that is initiated by calling .

span.span: Causes a communication object to transition from the created state into the opened state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用时， 方法使 进入 状态，并调用 、 和 。When called, the method causes a to enter into the state and calls , , and . 方法通过将对象状态设置为 状态来完成 方法。The method completes the method by setting the state of the object to the state.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Open() cil managed
abstract member Open : unit -> unit override this.Open : unit -> unit

summary.span: 让通信对象的状态从“已创建”变成“已打开”。

span.span: Causes a communication object to transition from the created state into the opened state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实例化 时，以 状态开始。When a is instantiated, it begins in the state. 在处于 状态时，可以配置此对象（例如，可以设置属性或注册事件），但仍不能用此对象发送或接收消息。In the state, the object can be configured (for example, properties can be set, or events can be registered), but it is not yet usable to send or receive messages. 调用时， 方法使 进入 状态，并调用 、 和 。When called, the method causes a to enter into the state and calls , , and . 方法通过将对象状态设置为 状态来完成 方法。The method completes the method by setting the state of the object to the state. 在In the 处于 状态时， 可用（例如，可以接收消息），但不能再对它进行配置。 state, the is usable (for example, messages can be received), but it is no longer configurable. 还有一个打开方法的异步版本，该方法可通过调用 来启动并通过调用 来完成。There is also an asynchronous version of the open method that is initiated by calling and completed by calling . ### 使用 Windows 身份验证捕获凭据Credentials Capture with Windows Authentication 当使用 Windows 身份验证时，服务使用的凭据基于当前的上下文线程。When using Windows authentication, credentials used by the service are based on the current context thread. 当调用 `Open` 方法时，会获取凭据。The credentials are obtained when the `Open` method is called. > [!NOTE] > 对于异步调用，当调用 时，会获取凭据。For asynchronous calls, credentials are captured when the is invoked. 但无法保证实际凭据。However, the actual credentials cannot be guaranteed. 即，调用方凭据可能被转换为其他标识。That is, the credentials of the caller may be switched to another identity. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Windows 客户端的消息安全性](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/message-security-with-a-windows-client.md)。For more information, see [Message Security with a Windows Client](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/message-security-with-a-windows-client.md).

span.span: Message Security with a Windows Client

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实例化 时，以 状态开始。When a is instantiated, it begins in the state. 在处于 状态时，可以配置此对象（例如，可以设置属性或注册事件），但仍不能用此对象发送或接收消息。In the state, the object can be configured (for example, properties can be set, or events can be registered), but it is not yet usable to send or receive messages. 调用时， 方法使 进入 状态，并调用 、 和 。When called, the method causes a to enter into the state and calls , , and . 方法通过将对象状态设置为 状态来完成 方法。The method completes the method by setting the state of the object to the state. 在In the 处于 状态时， 可用（例如，可以接收消息），但不能再对它进行配置。 state, the is usable (for example, messages can be received), but it is no longer configurable. 还有一个打开方法的异步版本，该方法可通过调用 来启动并通过调用 来完成。There is also an asynchronous version of the open method that is initiated by calling and completed by calling .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果通信对象处于 、 或 状态，则不引发异常。No exception is thrown if the communication object is in a , or state. 如果对某通信对象调用 ，则立即释放该通信对象。A communication object is disposed once is called on it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于对对象调用 之后对象即不可变，所以 状态是唯一一个既可变又不被释放的状态。Since an object is immutable after is called on it, the only state that is both mutable and not disposed is the state.
